CustomField.description: This is the rounded net change in kW DC. When SO is approved, field is stamped with 'Calculated Change in Subscription kW DC.' If Type = 'SSS Update,' field is stamped with value of 'System Change in kW Subscription' - 'Previous kW Subscription. It's important to have a static value for tracking purposes, and to use in rollup summary fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the rounded net change in kW DC. When SO is approved, field is stamped with 'Calculated Change in Subscription kW DC.' If Type = 'SSS Update,' field is stamped with value of 'System Change in kW Subscription' - 'Previous kW Subscription.
CustomField.label: Approved Change in Subscription (KW DC)
